>
[Troubadour's Cap](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2144)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cap

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This jaunty cap can take the form and color of any type of hat you wish upon investing the item, but it always has a peacock feather jutting out from one side. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks while wearing the cap. When you invest the cap, you either increase your Charisma score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
